projects.description: Practing basic JavaScript syntax and data structures by building a Random quote Generator, a program that displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button

Displaying a long list of items on a web page, like a list of 200 movie titles or 400 products, can overwhelm a user with too much information at once. A common solution is to display a handful of items on one page and provide navigation to jump to a list of more items. In this project, I used JavaScript to divide a long list into a series of pages to improve the user experienc of the webpage
Created a form to collect information from users for a Full Stack Conference to nsure that it was engaging, interactive and easy to use

Created a browser-based, word guessing game. Used JavaScript and object-oriented programming to select a random hidden phrase. A player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard
Leveraging the power of JavaScript I created an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API
